news.title: Gloria Gaynor, Kiss, and George Strait Get First Kennedy Center Honors Since Trump Takeover
news.summary: Actors Sylvester Stallone and Michael Crawford were also selected for honors

news.title: Silvana Estrada Announces Tour, Shares New “Dime” Video: Watch
news.summary: The Mexican musician will support new album Vendrán Suaves Lluvias with concerts in South America, Europe, and North America

news.title: Radiohead Release New Live Album Hail to the Thief (Live Recordings 2003-2009): Listen
news.summary: Recordings captured in London, Amsterdam, Buenos Aires, and Dublin document the 2003 album’s evolution into the In Rainbows era

news.title: Beverly Glenn-Copeland Covers Marvin Gaye’s “What’s Going On” and “Save the Children”: Watch
news.summary: New renditions of the What’s Going On classics, made with Elizabeth Glenn-Copeland, Thom Gill, Joseph Shabason, Jeremy Greenspan, and Bram Gielen

news.title: Black Eyes Announce Tour and First Album in 21 Years, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: The Washington, D.C., band worked with Ian MacKaye on comeback effort Hostile Design

news.title: Ryan Davis & the Roadhouse Band Add December Tour Dates
news.summary: New York, Chicago, Philadelphia, and several more cities have been added to the run behind New Threats From the Soul

news.title: The Mountain Goats to Reissue The Sunset Tree for 20th Anniversary
news.summary: The 2005 album, which houses fan favorite “This Year,” was remastered at Abbey Road Studios

news.title: Neko Case Announces 2026 Tour, Shares New Song: Listen
news.summary: “Winchester Mansion of Sound,” the latest from the singer-songwriter’s Neon Grey Midnight Green album, accompanies the North American dates

news.title: Tyler, the Creator and Timothée Chalamet Star in First Trailer for New Movie Marty Supreme: Watch
news.summary: Gwyneth Paltrow, Fren Drescher, and others also star in the A24 vehicle from director Josh Safdie

news.title: Kris Kollins to Play Prince in New Purple Rain Musical
news.summary: Watch Kollins and co-star Rachel Webb in a first-look rehearsal video, before the production begins its pre-Broadway run in Minneapolis
